creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: bound book with light blue cover; white cranes and mushroom like figures on front cover; two white flowers on back; contains black and white images of people engaged in various activities with narration
markings: top center, inside front cover, in pencil:[ IV]; upper center, back cover, in pencil: [Shinghi man kit???]; gold sticker LLQ, back cover: [718]; Japanese label back UR
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink on paper
title: Picture Book: Flowers of Words
